title: Playing with fire
creator_credit: National Fire Protection Association. Public Affairs Division, Christopher Knight and Frank Cantor
brief_description: Two children take some matches from home and set fire to a truck, which in the process of exploding burns them both badly. A doctor explains that dangers should be explained to children as so often in the domestic situation children are put at risk when with care and commonsense these can be avoided.
